mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.created_at, B.nm writer, B.main_pic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY iboard desc LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, A.created_at, A.updated_at, B.nm writer, B.main_pic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
